title: Complex Plane
description: Interactive visualization of complex numbers in the complex plane showing both rectangular (a + bi) and polar (r angle theta) forms with geometric representations including magnitude, phase, and projections.
creator: Dan McCreary
subject: Mathematics
Signal Processing
Complex Analysis

learningObjectives: Understand the geometric interpretation of complex numbers
Convert between rectangular and polar forms
Calculate magnitude and phase from components
Connect complex plane to phasor representation

controls.name: realSlider
controls.label: Real Part
controls.description: Adjusts the real component of the complex number

controls.name: imagSlider
controls.label: Imaginary Part
controls.description: Adjusts the imaginary component of the complex number

assumptions: Standard mathematical conventions for angle measurement
